gurmukhi: soriT mhlw 5 ]
roman: soraTh mahalaa panjavaa ||
english: Sorat'h, Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: gur kw sbdu rKvwry ]
roman: gur kaa sabadh rakhavaare ||
english: The Word of the Guru's Shabad is my Saving Grace.

gurmukhi: caukI cauigrd hmwry ]
roman: chaukee chaugiradh hamaare ||
english: It is a guardian posted on all four sides around me.

gurmukhi: rwm nwim mnu lwgw ]
roman: raam naam man laagaa ||
english: My mind is attached to the Lord's Name.

gurmukhi: jmu ljwie kir Bwgw ]1]
roman: jam lajai kar bhaagaa ||1||
english: The Messenger of Death has run away in shame. ||1||

gurmukhi: pRB jI qU myro suKdwqw ]
roman: prabh jee too mero sukhadhaataa ||
english: O Dear Lord, You are my Giver of peace.

gurmukhi: bMDn kwit kry mnu inrmlu pUrn purKu ibDwqw ] rhwau ]
roman: ba(n)dhan kaaT kare man niramal pooran purakh bidhaataa || rahaau ||
english: The Perfect Lord, the Architect of Destiny, has shattered my bonds, and made my mind immaculately pure. ||Pause||

gurmukhi: nwnk pRBu AibnwsI ]
roman: naanak prabh abinaasee ||
english: O Nanak, God is eternal and imperishable.

gurmukhi: qw kI syv n ibrQI jwsI ]
roman: taa kee sev na birathee jaasee ||
english: Service to Him shall never go unrewarded.

gurmukhi: And krih qyry dwsw ]
roman: anadh kareh tere dhaasaa ||
english: Your slaves are in bliss;

gurmukhi: jip pUrn hoeI Awsw ]2]4]68]
roman: jap pooran hoiee aasaa ||2||4||68||
english: chanting and meditating, their desires are fulfilled. ||2||4||68||

gurmukhi: iblwvlu mhlw 5 ]
roman: bilaaval mahalaa panjavaa ||
english: Bilaaval, Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: qwqI vwau n lgeI pwrbRhm srxweI ]
roman: taatee vaau na lagiee paarabraham saranaiee ||
english: The hot wind does not even touch one who is under the Protection of the Supreme Lord God.

gurmukhi: cauigrd hmwrY rwm kwr duKu lgY n BweI ]1]
roman: chaugiradh hamaarai raam kaar dhukh lagai na bhaiee ||1||
english: On all four sides I am surrounded by the Lord's Circle of Protection; pain does not afflict me, O Siblings of Destiny. ||1||

gurmukhi: siqguru pUrw ByitAw ijin bxq bxweI ]
roman: satigur pooraa bheTiaa jin banat banaiee ||
english: I have met the Perfect True Guru, who has done this deed.

gurmukhi: rwm nwmu AauKDu dIAw eykw ilv lweI ]1] rhwau ]
roman: raam naam aaukhadh dheeaa ekaa liv laiee ||1|| rahaau ||
english: He has given me the medicine of the Lord's Name, and I enshrine love for the One Lord. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: rwiK lIey iqin rKnhwir sB ibAwiD imtweI ]
roman: raakh le'ee tin rakhanahaar sabh biaadh miTaiee ||
english: The Savior Lord has saved me, and eradicated all my sickness.

gurmukhi: khu nwnk ikrpw BeI pRB Bey shweI ]2]15]79]
roman: kahu naanak kirapaa bhiee prabh bhe sahaiee ||2||15||79||
english: Says Nanak, God has showered me with His Mercy; He has become my help and support. ||2||15||79||

gurmukhi: sloku ]
roman: salok ||
english: Shalok:

gurmukhi: jh swDU goibd Bjnu kIrqnu nwnk nIq ]
roman: jeh saadhoo gobidh bhajan keeratan naanak neet ||
english: Where the Holy people constantly vibrate the Kirtan of the Praises of the Lord of the Universe, O Nanak

gurmukhi: xw hau xw qUM xh Cutih inkit n jweIAhu dUq ]1]
roman: naa hau naa too(n) neh chhuTeh nikaT na jaieeahu dhoot ||1||
english: - the Righteous Judge says, ""Do not approach that place, O Messenger of Death, or else neither you nor I shall escape!""||1||

gurmukhi: slok mÚ 5 ]
roman: salok mahalaa panjavaa ||
english: Shalok, Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: mn mih icqvau icqvnI audmu krau auiT nIq ]
roman: man meh chitavau chitavanee udham karau uTh neet ||
english: Within my mind, I think thoughts of always rising early, and making the effort.

gurmukhi: hir kIrqn kw Awhro hir dyhu nwnk ky mIq ]1]
roman: har keeratan kaa aaharo har dheh naanak ke meet ||1||
english: O Lord, my Friend, please bless Nanak with the habit of singing the Kirtan of the Lord's Praises. ||1||

gurmukhi: pauVI ]
roman: pauRee ||
english: Pauree:

gurmukhi: rYix idnsu prBwiq qUhY hI gwvxw ]
roman: rain dhinas parabhaat toohai hee gaavanaa ||
english: Night and day, morning and night, I sing to You, Lord.

gurmukhi: jIA jMq srbq nwau qyrw iDAwvxw ]
roman: jeea ja(n)t sarabat naau teraa dhiaavanaa ||
english: All beings and creatures meditate on Your Name.

gurmukhi: qU dwqw dwqwru qyrw idqw Kwvxw ]
roman: too dhaataa dhaataar teraa dhitaa khaavanaa ||
english: You are the Giver, the Great Giver; we eat whatever You give us.

gurmukhi: Bgq jnw kY sMig pwp gvwvxw ]
roman: bhagat janaa kai sa(n)g paap gavaavanaa ||
english: In the congregation of the devotees, sins are eradicated.

gurmukhi: jn nwnk sd bilhwrY bil bil jwvxw ]25]
roman: jan naanak sadh balihaarai bal bal jaavanaa ||25||
english: Servant Nanak is forever a sacrifice, a sacrifice, a sacrifice, O Lord. ||25||

gurmukhi: soihlw rwgu gauVI dIpkI mhlw 1
roman: sohilaa raag gauRee dheepakee mahalaa pehilaa
english: Sohilaa ~ The Song Of Praise. Raag Gauree Deepakee, First Mehla:

gurmukhi: ÃÄ siqgur pRswid ]
roman: ikOankaar satigur prasaadh ||
english: One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru:

gurmukhi: jY Gir kIriq AwKIAY krqy kw hoie bIcwro ]
roman: jai ghar keerat aakheeaai karate kaa hoi beechaaro ||
english: In that house where the Praises of the Creator are chanted and contemplated

gurmukhi: iqqu Gir gwvhu soihlw isvirhu isrjxhwro ]1]
roman: tit ghar gaavahu sohilaa sivarih sirajanahaaro ||1||
english: -in that house, sing Songs of Praise; meditate and remember the Creator Lord. ||1||

gurmukhi: qum gwvhu myry inrBau kw soihlw ]
roman: tum gaavahu mere nirabhau kaa sohilaa ||
english: Sing the Songs of Praise of my Fearless Lord.

gurmukhi: hau vwrI ijqu soihlY sdw suKu hoie ]1] rhwau ]
roman: hau vaaree jit sohilai sadhaa sukh hoi ||1|| rahaau ||
english: I am a sacrifice to that Song of Praise which brings eternal peace. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: inq inq jIAVy smwlIAin dyKYgw dyvxhwru ]
roman: nit nit jeeaRe samaaleean dhekhaigaa dhevanahaar ||
english: Day after day, He cares for His beings; the Great Giver watches over all.

gurmukhi: qyry dwnY kImiq nw pvY iqsu dwqy kvxu sumwru ]2]
roman: tere dhaanai keemat naa pavai tis dhaate kavan sumaar ||2||
english: Your Gifts cannot be appraised; how can anyone compare to the Giver? ||2||

gurmukhi: sMbiq swhw iliKAw imil kir pwvhu qylu ]
roman: sa(n)bat saahaa likhiaa mil kar paavahu tel ||
english: The day of my wedding is pre-ordained. Come, gather together and pour the oil over the threshold.

gurmukhi: dyhu sjx AsIsVIAw ijau hovY swihb isau mylu ]3]
roman: dheh sajan aseesaReeaa jiau hovai saahib siau mel ||3||
english: My friends, give me your blessings, that I may merge with my Lord and Master. ||3||

gurmukhi: Gir Gir eyho pwhucw sdVy inq pvMin ]
roman: ghar ghar eho paahuchaa sadhaRe nit pava(n)n ||
english: Unto each and every home, into each and every heart, this summons is sent out; the call comes each and every day.

gurmukhi: sdxhwrw ismrIAY nwnk sy idh AwvMin ]4]1]
roman: sadhanahaaraa simareeaai naanak se dheh aava(n)n ||4||1||
english: Remember in meditation the One who summons us; O Nanak, that day is drawing near! ||4||1||

gurmukhi: rwgu Awsw mhlw 1 ]
roman: raag aasaa mahalaa pehilaa ||
english: Raag Aasaa, First Mehla:

gurmukhi: iCA Gr iCA gur iCA aupdys ]
roman: chhia ghar chhia gur chhia upadhes ||
english: There are six schools of philosophy, six teachers, and six sets of teachings.

gurmukhi: guru guru eyko vys Anyk ]1]
roman: gur gur eko ves anek ||1||
english: But the Teacher of teachers is the One, who appears in so many forms. ||1||

gurmukhi: bwbw jY Gir krqy kIriq hoie ]
roman: baabaa jai ghar karate keerat hoi ||
english: O Baba: that system in which the Praises of the Creator are sung

gurmukhi: so Gru rwKu vfweI qoie ]1] rhwau ]
roman: so ghar raakh vaddaiee toi ||1|| rahaau ||
english: -follow that system; in it rests true greatness. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: ivsuey cisAw GVIAw phrw iQqI vwrI mwhu hoAw ]
roman: visue chasiaa ghaReeaa paharaa thitee vaaree maahu hoaa ||
english: The seconds, minutes and hours, days, weeks and months,

gurmukhi: sUrju eyko ruiq Anyk ]
roman: sooraj eko rut anek ||
english: and the various seasons originate from the one sun;

gurmukhi: nwnk krqy ky kyqy vys ]2]2]
roman: naanak karate ke kete ves ||2||2||
english: O Nanak, in just the same way, the many forms originate from the Creator. ||2||2||

gurmukhi: rwgu DnwsrI mhlw 1 ]
roman: raag dhanaasaree mahalaa pehilaa ||
english: Raag Dhanaasaree, First Mehla:

gurmukhi: ggn mY Qwlu riv cMdu dIpk bny qwirkw mMfl jnk moqI ]
roman: gagan mai thaal rav cha(n)dh dheepak bane taarikaa ma(n)ddal janak motee ||
english: Upon that cosmic plate of the sky, the sun and the moon are the lamps. The stars and their orbs are the studded pearls.

gurmukhi: DUpu mlAwnlo pvxu cvro kry sgl bnrwie PUlµq joqI ]1]
roman: dhoop malaanalo pavan chavaro kare sagal banarai foola(n)t jotee ||1||
english: The fragrance of sandalwood in the air is the temple incense, and the wind is the fan. All the plants of the world are the altar flowers in offering to You, O Luminous Lord. ||1||

gurmukhi: kYsI AwrqI hoie ] Bv KMfnw qyrI AwrqI ]
roman: kaisee aaratee hoi || bhav kha(n)ddanaa teree aaratee ||
english: What a beautiful Aartee, lamp-lit worship service this is! O Destroyer of Fear, this is Your Ceremony of Light.

gurmukhi: Anhqw sbd vwjMq ByrI ]1] rhwau ]
roman: anahataa sabadh vaaja(n)t bheree ||1|| rahaau ||
english: The Unstruck Sound-current of the Shabad is the vibration of the temple drums. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: shs qv nYn nn nYn hih qoih kau shs mUriq nnw eyk quohI ]
roman: sahas tav nain nan nain heh toh kau sahas moorat nanaa ek tuohee ||
english: You have thousands of eyes, and yet You have no eyes. You have thousands of forms, and yet You do not have even one.

gurmukhi: shs pd ibml nn eyk pd gMD ibnu shs qv gMD iev clq mohI ]2]
roman: sahas padh bimal nan ek padh ga(n)dh bin sahas tav ga(n)dh iv chalat mohee ||2||
english: You have thousands of Lotus Feet, and yet You do not have even one foot. You have no nose, but you have thousands of noses. This Play of Yours entrances me. ||2||

gurmukhi: sB mih joiq joiq hY soie ]
roman: sabh meh jot jot hai soi ||
english: Amongst all is the Light-You are that Light.

gurmukhi: iqs dY cwnix sB mih cwnxu hoie ]
roman: tis dhai chaanan sabh meh chaanan hoi ||
english: By this Illumination, that Light is radiant within all.

gurmukhi: gur swKI joiq prgtu hoie ]
roman: gur saakhee jot paragaT hoi ||
english: Through the Guru's Teachings, the Light shines forth.

gurmukhi: jo iqsu BwvY su AwrqI hoie ]3]
roman: jo tis bhaavai su aaratee hoi ||3||
english: That which is pleasing to Him is the lamp-lit worship service. ||3||

gurmukhi: hir crx kvl mkrMd loiBq mno Anidnuo moih AwhI ipAwsw ]
roman: har charan kaval makara(n)dh lobhit mano anadhinuo moh aahee piaasaa ||
english: My mind is enticed by the honey-sweet Lotus Feet of the Lord. Day and night, I thirst for them.

gurmukhi: ik®pw jlu dyih nwnk swirMg kau hoie jw qy qyrY nwie vwsw ]4]3]
roman: kirapaa jal dheh naanak saari(n)g kau hoi jaa te terai nai vaasaa ||4||3||
english: Bestow the Water of Your Mercy upon Nanak, the thirsty song-bird, so that he may come to dwell in Your Name. ||4||3||

gurmukhi: rwgu gauVI pUrbI mhlw 4 ]
roman: raag gauRee poorabee mahalaa chauthhaa ||
english: Raag Gauree Poorbee, Fourth Mehla:

gurmukhi: kwim kroiD ngru bhu BirAw imil swDU KMfl KMfw hy ]
roman: kaam karodh nagar bahu bhariaa mil saadhoo kha(n)ddal kha(n)ddaa he ||
english: The body-village is filled to overflowing with anger and sexual desire; these were broken into bits when I met with the Holy Saint.

gurmukhi: pUrib ilKq ilKy guru pwieAw min hir ilv mMfl mMfw hy ]1]
roman: poorab likhat likhe gur paiaa man har liv ma(n)ddal ma(n)ddaa he ||1||
english: By pre-ordained destiny, I have met with the Guru. I have entered into the realm of the Lord's Love. ||1||

gurmukhi: kir swDU AMjulI punu vfw hy ]
roman: kar saadhoo a(n)julee pun vaddaa he ||
english: Greet the Holy Saint with your palms pressed together; this is an act of great merit.

gurmukhi: kir fMfauq punu vfw hy ]1] rhwau ]
roman: kar dda(n)ddaut pun vaddaa he ||1|| rahaau ||
english: Bow down before Him; this is a virtuous action indeed. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: swkq hir rs swdu n jwixAw iqn AMqir haumY kMfw hy ]
roman: saakat har ras saadh na jaaniaa tin a(n)tar haumai ka(n)ddaa he ||
english: The wicked shaaktas, the faithless cynics, do not know the Taste of the Lord's Sublime Essence. The thorn of egotism is embedded deep within them.

gurmukhi: ijau ijau clih cuBY duKu pwvih jmkwlu shih isir fMfw hy ]2]
roman: jiau jiau chaleh chubhai dhukh paaveh jamakaal saheh sir dda(n)ddaa he ||2||
english: The more they walk away, the deeper it pierces them, and the more they suffer in pain, until finally, the Messenger of Death smashes his club against their heads. ||2||

gurmukhi: hir jn hir hir nwim smwxy duKu jnm mrx Bv KMfw hy ]
roman: har jan har har naam samaane dhukh janam maran bhav kha(n)ddaa he ||
english: The humble servants of the Lord are absorbed in the Name of the Lord, Har, Har. The pain of birth and the fear of death are eradicated.

gurmukhi: AibnwsI purKu pwieAw prmysru bhu soB KMf bRhmMfw hy ]3]
roman: abinaasee purakh paiaa paramesar bahu sobh kha(n)dd brahama(n)ddaa he ||3||
english: They have found the Imperishable Supreme Being, the Transcendent Lord God, and they receive great honor throughout all the worlds and realms. ||3||

gurmukhi: hm grIb mskIn pRB qyry hir rwKu rwKu vf vfw hy ]
roman: ham gareeb masakeen prabh tere har raakh raakh vadd vaddaa he ||
english: I am poor and meek, God, but I belong to You! Save me-please save me, O Greatest of the Great!

gurmukhi: jn nwnk nwmu ADwru tyk hY hir nwmy hI suKu mMfw hy ]4]4]
roman: jan naanak naam adhaar Tek hai har naame hee sukh ma(n)ddaa he ||4||4||
english: Servant Nanak takes the Sustenance and Support of the Naam. In the Name of the Lord, he enjoys celestial peace. ||4||4||

gurmukhi: rwgu gauVI pUrbI mhlw 5 ]
roman: raag gauRee poorabee mahalaa panjavaa ||
english: Raag Gauree Poorbee, Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: krau bynµqI suxhu myry mIqw sMq thl kI bylw ]
roman: karau bena(n)tee sunahu mere meetaa sa(n)t Tahal kee belaa ||
english: Listen, my friends, I beg of you: now is the time to serve the Saints!

gurmukhi: eIhw Kwit clhu hir lwhw AwgY bsnu suhylw ]1]
roman: e'eehaa khaaT chalahu har laahaa aagai basan suhelaa ||1||
english: In this world, earn the profit of the Lord's Name, and hereafter, you shall dwell in peace. ||1||

gurmukhi: AauD GtY idnsu rYxwry ] mn gur imil kwj svwry ]1] rhwau ]
roman: aaudh ghaTai dhinas rainaare || man gur mil kaaj savaare ||1|| rahaau ||
english: This life is diminishing, day and night. Meeting with the Guru, your affairs shall be resolved. ||1||Pause||

gurmukhi: iehu sMswru ibkwru sMsy mih qirE bRhm igAwnI ]
roman: eih sa(n)saar bikaar sa(n)se meh tario braham giaanee ||
english: This world is engrossed in corruption and cynicism. Only those who know God are saved.

gurmukhi: ijsih jgwie pIAwvY iehu rsu AkQ kQw iqin jwnI ]2]
roman: jiseh jagai peeaavai ih ras akath kathaa tin jaanee ||2||
english: Only those who are awakened by the Lord to drink in this Sublime Essence, come to know the Unspoken Speech of the Lord. ||2||

gurmukhi: jw kau Awey soeI ibhwJhu hir gur qy mnih bsyrw ]
roman: jaa kau aae soiee bihaajhahu har gur te maneh baseraa ||
english: Purchase only that for which you have come into the world, and through the Guru, the Lord shall dwell within your mind.

gurmukhi: inj Gir mhlu pwvhu suK shjy bhuir n hoiego Pyrw ]3]
roman: nij ghar mahal paavahu sukh sahaje bahur na hoigo feraa ||3||
english: Within the home of your own inner being, you shall obtain the Mansion of the Lord's Presence with intuitive ease. You shall not be consigned again to the wheel of reincarnation. ||3||

gurmukhi: AMqrjwmI purK ibDwqy srDw mn kI pUry ]
roman: a(n)tarajaamee purakh bidhaate saradhaa man kee poore ||
english: O Inner-knower, Searcher of Hearts, O Primal Being, Architect of Destiny: please fulfill this yearning of my mind.

gurmukhi: nwnk dwsu iehY suKu mwgY mo kau kir sMqn kI DUry ]4]5]
roman: naanak dhaas ihai sukh maagai mo kau kar sa(n)tan kee dhoore ||4||5||
english: Nanak, Your slave, begs for this happiness: let me be the dust of the feet of the Saints. ||4||5||

gurmukhi: ÃÄ siq nwmu krqw purKu inrBau inrvYru Akwl mUriq AjUnI sYBM gur pRswid ]
roman: ikOankaar sat naam karataa purakh nirabhau niravair akaal moorat ajoonee saibha(n) gur prasaadh ||
english: One Universal Creator God. The Name Is Truth. Creative Being Personified. No Fear. No Hatred. Image Of The Undying, Beyond Birth, Self-Existent. By Guru's Grace ~

gurmukhi: ] jpu ]
roman: || jap ||
english: Name of the Composition, "Jup". Chant And Meditate:

gurmukhi: Awid scu jugwid scu ]
roman: aadh sach jugaadh sach ||
english: True In The Primal Beginning. True Throughout The Ages.

gurmukhi: hY BI scu nwnk hosI BI scu ]1]
roman: hai bhee sach naanak hosee bhee sach ||1||
english: True Here And Now. O Nanak, Forever And Ever True. ||1||

gurmukhi: sloku ]
roman: salok ||
english: Shalok:

gurmukhi: pvxu gurU pwxI ipqw mwqw Driq mhqu ]
roman: pavan guroo paanee pitaa maataa dharat mahat ||
english: Air is the Guru, Water is the Father, and Earth is the Great Mother of all.

gurmukhi: idvsu rwiq duie dweI dwieAw KylY sgl jgqu ]
roman: dhivas raat dhui dhaiee dhaiaa khelai sagal jagat ||
english: Day and night are each like the nanny and her caregiving husband, in whose lap the whole world is at play.

gurmukhi: cMigAweIAw buirAweIAw vwcY Drmu hdUir ]
roman: cha(n)giaaieeaa buriaaieeaa vaachai dharam hadhoor ||
english: Good deeds and bad deeds-the record is read out in the Presence of the Lord of Dharma.

gurmukhi: krmI Awpo AwpxI ky nyVY ky dUir ]
roman: karamee aapo aapanee ke neRai ke dhoor ||
english: According to their own actions, some are drawn closer, and some are driven farther away.

gurmukhi: ijnI nwmu iDAwieAw gey mskiq Gwil ]
roman: jinee naam dhiaaiaa ge masakat ghaal ||
english: Those who have meditated on the Naam, the Name of the Lord, and departed after having worked by the sweat of their brows

gurmukhi: nwnk qy muK aujly kyqI CutI nwil ]1]
roman: naanak te mukh ujale ketee chhuTee naal ||1||
english: -O Nanak, their faces are radiant in the Court of the Lord, and many are saved along with them! ||1||

gurmukhi: ÃÄ siqgur pRswid ]
roman: ikOankaar satigur prasaadh ||
english: The Lord is One and He can be attained through the grace of the true Guru.

gurmukhi: jwpu ]
roman: jaap ||
english: Name of the Bani : Japu Sahib

gurmukhi: sRI muKvwk pwiqswhI 10 ]
roman: sree mukhavaak paatisaahee 10 ||
english: The sacred utterance of The Tenth Sovereign:

gurmukhi: CpY CMd ] qÍ pRswid ]
roman: chhapai chha(n)dh || tavai prasaadh ||
english: CHHAPAI STANZA. BY THY GRACE

gurmukhi: c`kR ichn Aru brn jwiq Aru pwiq nihn ijh ]
roman: cha'kr chihan ar baran jaat ar paat nahin jeh ||
english: He who is without mark or sign, He who is without caste or line.

gurmukhi: rUp rMg Aru ryK ByK koaU kih n skiq ikh ]
roman: roop ra(n)g ar rekh bhekh kouoo keh na sakat keh ||
english: He who is without colour or form, and without any distinctive norm.

gurmukhi: Acl mUriq AnBau pRkws Aimqoij kih`jY ]
roman: achal moorat anabhau prakaas amitoj kahi'jai ||
english: He who is without limit and motion, All effulgence, non-descript Ocean.

gurmukhi: koit ieMdR ieMdRwx swhu swhwix gixjY ]
roman: koT i(n)dhr i(n)dhraan saahu saahaan ganijai ||
english: The Lord of millions of Indras and kings, the Master of all worlds and beings.

gurmukhi: iqRBvx mhIp sur nr Asur nyq nyq bn iqRx khq ]
roman: tirabhavan maheep sur nar asur net net ban tiran kahat ||
